author: Brian Kane
description: Bittersweet and spiritous with herbal and subtle chocolate notes. Beware, "boozy" is an understatement, so perhaps split this recipe between two small stemmed glasses rather than one coupe and share the experience with a friend.
name: Yesterday, Today and Amaro
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
